snippet: The police officers took off their badges and laced up gloves for a "grudge match," an unofficial but officiated method for dealing with bad blood within the force.
abstract: The police officers took off their badges and laced up gloves for a "grudge match," an unofficial but officiated method for dealing with bad blood within the force.

headline.main: Taking Off Badges and Lacing Up Gloves to Settle a Score
